subject: Olympic Games
Terrorism
Murders and Attempted Murders
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: The Israeli government requested a moment of silence be observed 40 years after 11 Israeli athletes and coaches were killed at the Munich Games, but the International Olympic Committee refused.
snippet: The Israeli government requested a moment of silence be observed 40 years after 11 Israeli athletes and coaches were killed at the Munich Games, but the International Olympic Committee refused.
